name: obi web services extension
short_description: This is an application ontology extend ontology for biomedical investigations (OBI). It is planning to reuse concepts existing in Bioinformatics operations, types of data, data formats and topics (EDAM) ontology. The ontology is used to annotate web services semantically and help generation of workflow for biomedical data analysis.
